title: Cosmic Queries – Physics All Around Us
description:
Did you know there are physics at work all around us? Join your personal astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and comic co-host Chuck Nice as they answer fan-submitted questions on the physics of life, big and small.


NOTE: StarTalk All-Access subscribers can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free here: https://www.startalkradio.net/all-access/cosmic-queries-physics-all-around-us/

Photo Credit: Offnfopt (Public Domain via Wikimedia Commons).
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
